â—£â—¥  New Syllabus Challenge!

A new series of fun little challenges, levelled from 1 to 10 covering all aspects of fundamental parkour.

ðŸŽ¯ Step Underbar

Flowing Challenge - Chaining 3

Demonstrate a seamless connection between a step-vault on a hip-height railing to an underbar over a knee-height middle bar.

As you exit the step vault on one foot, pivot on the hand on the rail and drop down into the underbar position. Keep turning and exit the underbar while turning.

Repeat three times in both directions.

You must maintain a consistent speed while performing the entire route.

You cannot sit on the middle bar while performing the underbar.

You must finish on both feet turned 180 degrees back the way you came.


-- Rules of Challenge --

Rule 1 description : The height of the rail must be hip-height or greater.
Rule 2 description : The height of the rail middle-bar must be knee-height or greater.
Rule 3 description : Both sides must be performed.
Rule 4 description : Three repetitions on each side (6 reps in total).
Rule 5 description : Speed of movement must be a consistent jogging speed.
Rule 6 description : Finish facing the opposite direction as your starting direction.
